IMOD 4.5.0 Starting Points

To start out, read the IMOD users guide. It contains instructions for installing IMOD and importing data into IMOD, and links to other documentation. The documentation for this installed version of IMOD is available by typing "imodhelp" at the command line. The documentation for the most recent stable release version is available on the IMOD web site; here is the index file.
  • The IMOD home page.
  • Download IMOD and sample data sets.
  • Join the IMOD discussion and mailing lists.
  • Register IMOD and help us continue work on this project.
  • Report IMOD bugs.
  • Read the Copyright and credits notice.
